text: Mahmut Nedim Uslu (1 January 1947 in Adana, Turkey) is a businessman, former basketball player/coach and Vice President, General Secretary and Press Officer of Turkish multi-sport club Fenerbahçe.Biography in frmtr.com.tr Besides his native Turkish he speaks English, Russian and Turkmen fluently.Fenerbahçe official website board members page He coached Anadolu Efes between 1980–82 and Fenerbahçe in the 1985-86 season. == External links == * Fenerbahçe official website presidents page == References == Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Fenerbahçe S.K. board members Category:Turkish businesspeople Category:Turkish men's basketball players Category:Turkish basketball coaches Category:Fenerbahçe basketball coaches
title: Mahmut Uslu
